features: Stable Tripod Base: CAHAYA tripod boom microphone tripod legs extends further than others which can stand holds microphone securely in place. Non-slip foot cover prevent it from moving around.
Carrying Bag & Universal Mic Clips: it comes with carrying bag and 2 mic clips: barrel style & clothespin style, fits for most types of microphones.

Stand Height Adjustable: microphone stand height can be adjusted from 25.2”/64cm to 62.2”/158cm, perfect floor use mic stand for stage performance, speeches, meeting rooms, party, wedding, karaoke sing or live broadcasts etc.

Extendable & Removable Boom Arm: boom arm extends freely within 16.9”-30.1” (43cm -76.5cm) and 360° angle rotatable through adjustment knobs which allows for easy positioning. Simply remove the boom arm and attach microphone clip to convert the mic stand into a traditional straight mic stand.
Portable and Easy to Assemble: all parts could be stored in a provided carrying bag for convenient transport.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic stand
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this new stand. Seems much sturdier than the one it is replacing and very good value for money. Also like the fact it can be broken down into a compact package, and even comes with a case!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and affordable
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good home studio microphone stand for the price! Gets the job done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice stand for light work
reviews.reviewText: Packs up well, decent build quality and nice and lightweight, but can't stand up to tough gigging. I intended to use this as a vocal mic while drumming and it just can't handle the weight of the mic and a gooseneck adapter. should work fine for cafe singer/songwriter stuff or for practice, but won't handle heavy mics or intense gigging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was hoping to receive
reviews.reviewText: I am a lead singer in a band and lost my expensive mic stand that was in storage. I was about to replace it with another $100 mic stand but decided to take a look on Amazon before I made that purchase. I saw this item and I googled it I saw that it had good reviews and the price was significantly lower. So I purchased it. I ordered it that night and it came the next morning. It comes in a nice case with a handle and is very easy to assemble and disassemble. So it works perfectly in that way for gigs. Also, it is just as sturdy as my old more expensive stand and has all of the same features, It is very adjustable and can suit all height and distance needs. I would highly recommend this stand. It is great quality and the value is awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tripod and excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: I really like the tripod - easy portability in a small bag, easy to set up and adjust, and it's sturdy and just what I needed - a high-quality but easy-to-lug boom mic for gigging. More importantly, Cahaya gave great customer service. When my initial tripod arrived without the boom, I contacted them through Amazon. They replied immediately, asking for a photo of what was in the box. Once I did that they came right back and said they were shipping me a totally new tripod, which arrived in a few days. It's likely that Amazon had sent me a returned tripod (and not an error by the company). Terrific customer service and I'll definitely buy another tripod from them down the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not durable. Plastic pieces break easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly, well made, good height, fully adjustable, and I'm glad it came with two different types of mic holders. My microphone handle is larger than average, and I didn't read the full description like I should have, so I was relived it came with the extra clamp for larger mics. I will say the clamp doesn't hold as firmly as I'd like it to, but I don't think it'll be a problem. It does the trick. I'm 5'8 and assembled at max height, this microphone stand is perfect. Probably wouldn't be ideal for anyone over 6', but perfect for me. Definitely a good choice for karaoke night with the fam

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for attaching a mic!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a new pencil mic and needed a sturdy tripod for it. I purchased this one and it worked like a dream. A few weeks into using it, I lost a screw and messaged the seller to find out what screw size I needed to purchase to replace the one I lost. The seller messaged me back within hours and told me an easy workaround– one of the mic clips has a part inside that works as a screw. The seller even sent me some photos to show me how to make it work. 10/10 purchase and helpfulness from the seller.

Me ha sido de gran utilidad, el material es de buena calidad y lo he estado utilizando ya por un par de meses y no se ha maltratado ni barrido las turcas, claro que lo he manejado con la precaución debida, si tu cómo yo instalas y desinstalas tu equipo en diferentes partes, te será muy funcional por espacio y fácil modo de transportarlo
Great product. Stores away very compact. Easy to set up and very sturdy. A really good buy.

Cumple su función, no creo que sea de uso rudo para un estudio que lo armen y desarmen constantemente o shows en vivo. Pero en mi caso que le doy un uso en estudio pero cuidado me resuelve muy bien …..

reviews.reviewTitle: A bit more flimsy than I had hoped
reviews.reviewText: The adjustment knobs look a bit flimsy and the stand its self was not as solid as I had hoped it would be..Maybe everything is getting pretty crappy now, I must be showing my age.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funcional, buen precio-calidad. Oportunidad en durabilidad.
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto lo practico que es para usar y para cargar. Buena relacion precio - calidad. Durabilidad es donde veo el problema.
